The will states that his grandfather was a rich and prosperous diamond merchant living in Pakistan before the partition of the country. He hid 900 precious gems in an ancient temple, before escaping to India, after the partition. He travels across the border to claim his inheritance. Sultan, an evil man stops him from claiming possession of what rightly belongs to him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Lawyer Fletcher Reede (Jim Carrey) lies constantly, a habit thats decimated his marriage to Audrey (Maura Tierney) and threatens to alienate his son, Max (Justin Cooper). But when Max makes a birthday wish that somehow comes true, Fletcher suddenly finds hes incapable of lying which sends him into a panic as hes set to try a crucial case. Jennifer Tilly also stars in director Tom Shadyacs Golden Globe nominated comedy. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: In Andy's absence, his toys come to life and engage in a discussion. Woody, Andy's favourite cowboy doll, is worried that after Andy's birthday, wherein his mother would gift him a new toy, Buzz Lightyear, his importance may get reduced. He thus hatches a plan to eliminate Buzz, but they both end up fighting at a gas station and are left behind as Andy drives away. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: As Steve Rogers battles to accept his role in the modern globe, he joins forces with another super soldier, the Black Widow, to fight against a fresh peril, a killer known as the Winter Soldier. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Mercenaries William and Tovar are imprisoned in the Great Wall by a faction called the Nameless Order, which battles alien monsters that attack every sixty years. Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: An unmanned, half-mile-long freight train hurtles towards a town at breakneck speed. An engineer and a young conductor, who happen to be on the same route, must race against time to try and stop it. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Interracial couple Chris and Rose go on a weekend getaway to the latter's parents' home. Chris is initially sceptical because Rose's parents are unaware he is African American, but nothing prepares him for the horrors that await him. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: Billie and Pete, a married couple, take a family skiing vacation to Austria. However, after having a near-death experience, they are forced to confront their relationship and feelings for each other. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: The headquarters of the Kingsman organisation is destroyed by Poppy Adams, a psychotic leader of the world's largest drug cartel, the Golden Circle. Although Eggsy and Merlin survive the attack, they need help to go against the resourceful drug cartel and contact their allies in the United States. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: Terri Henson lives a peaceful life along with her husband Jeffery and her two children Sam and Ryan. While Jeffery is away to meet his father, a charming stranger arrives at the Hensons asking for help with his car. He introduces himself as Colin Evans and Terri invites him over for food as it is dinner time. Terri's good deed soon turns out to be a terrible mistake when Colin kills her friend Meg and holds her family hostage. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A few Jewish soldiers are on an undercover mission to bring down the Nazi government and put an end to the war. Meanwhile, a woman wants to avenge the death of her family from a German officer. (Film - War)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Based on a story written by Hollywood's renowned Adam Horowitz, Walt Disney Pictures releases 'Tron: Legacy', a sequel to the 1982 cult film 'Tron', which created a buzz among video game geeks as well as movie buffs, that depicts the adventurous journey of Sam, son of a video game developer who mysteriously disappeared 20 years ago, as he is sucked into a virtual reality called the Grid, created by his father, with a mission to stop a corrupted programme from invading the human world. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.desc: Woody takes upon himself to protect Bonnie's new favourite toy, Forky, who is experiencing an existential crisis as he considers himself to be trash. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Norah and her team find themselves in a dangerous situation as they work at the bottom of the Mariana Trench and clash against an unidentified species. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with terminal cancer, mercenary Wade Wilson undergoes a rogue experiment that tortures him and leaves him heavily disfigured. With a set of newly-acquired skills and accelerated healing abilities, he sets out to take down the man responsible. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Land Before Time: Journey Of The Brave
programme.desc: Littlefoot, a baby dinosaur, finds out that his father is in trouble after the latter does not return home. Later, Littlefoot sets out with his friends to rescue him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The Alpha Omega, a paramilitary faction, attacks Caesar's clan, killing his wife and the oldest son. Angered, Caeser rallies his army to take revenge from Colonel, the man behind the faction. Battling his own dark instincts, he decides to lead a final confrontation that will determine the future of the planet. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Night At The Museum: Secret Of The Tomb
programme.desc: The endearing museum security guard Larry Daley discovers that the Tablet of Ahkmenrah is corroding and the exhibits will not be able to come to life at night. After learning that the secret to restoring it lies with Ahkmenrah's parents, he sets out on a wild adventure across the globe to save the museum's precious inhabitants. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 4
programme.desc: Woody takes upon himself to protect Bonnie's new favourite toy, Forky, who is experiencing an existential crisis as he considers himself to be trash. Later, while the family is on a road trip, Forky jumps out of the RV and Woody pursues him. He convinces him to return, but on their way back they find several lost toys and an old friend. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Glass Houses
programme.desc: Carrie Dawson is a teenage babysitter who learns about a humiliating family scandal and the person who is suspected to be the reason for it. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: After his son, Nemo, gets abducted in the Great Barrier Reef and is despatched to a fish tank in a dentist's office in Sydney, Marlin, a meek clownfish, embarks on a journey to bring him home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Circus performer Holt Farrier returns home after the First World War and is tasked with caring for a newborn elephant with oversized ears, Dumbo. The circus is undergoing a financial crisis but when it is discovered that Dumbo can fly, vultures close in under the pretext of making him an icon. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins dons the role of a sophisticated CIA agent who tries to transform a street punk (Chris Rock) into a savvy spy after the death of his twin brother. They must together save their city from terrorists. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: This live-action retelling of the Disney classic follows Belle, who has taken her father's place in the Beast's castle and befriended its enchanted servants. She soon discovers the reason behind the creature's frightful exterior and begins appreciating his true nature. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Spies In Disguise
programme.desc: Lance Sterling, a secret agent, finds himself transformed into a pigeon. He then sets out with his associate Walter to stop a villain who is using Sterling's disguise to carry out a dangerous plan. (Film - Animation)

She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies. Things quickly spin out of control. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Iron Man
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Scrat accidentally sets off an asteroid to Earth while trying to get his acorn. However, Manny, Sid and Diego must join forces with Buck to prevent the asteroid from wiping out their existence. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: The third film in this animation franchise follows Lightning McQueen, who enlists the help of race technician Cruz Ramirez to get back in the racing game after the rise of a younger, faster generation of racers. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim gets jealous when his parents give all their attention to his little brother. Tim soon learns that the baby can talk and the two team up to foil the plans of the CEO of Puppy Co. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bumbling crooks pose as photographers to kidnap the son of a millionaire. But the baby turns out to be smarter than them, making it difficult for them to hold on to him. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: Quinn McKenna, an army sniper, along with some fugitives and a scientist, sets out to kill the Predator and save Rory, his son, who was abducted as his autism reflects advancement in human evolution. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an inventor, leads an army of ants against a group of grasshoppers who steal their food every year. He also enlists a troop of circus bugs to help him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Childhood friends Rafe and Danny become army pilots and meet Evelyn, a navy nurse. However, the three of them later find themselves in the middle of the attack on Pearl Harbour during World War II. (Film - War)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Starring action stalwarts Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger, the movie revolves around the exploits of a security system expert who is imprisoned in a high-tech prison and must figure out an ingenious way to escape. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must save Jack Sparrow and form an alliance with the pirates around the world to fight against the East India Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A few Jewish soldiers are on an undercover mission to bring down the Nazi government and put an end to the war. Meanwhile, a woman wants to avenge the death of her family from a German officer. (Film - War)

programme.desc: Based on the fantastical 'Barsoom' series by Edgar Rice Burroughs, this action adventure film follows the exploits of a courageous Civil War veteran, John Carter, who finds himself transported to a barren planet, Barsoom (Mars), when he touches a mysterious medallion. Once there, he finds himself in the middle of a conflict and is soon captured. With the superhuman strength he seems to have gained on the planet, is he meant to be the deliverer of peace in Barsoom. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Land Of The Lost
programme.desc: Palaeontologist Dr Rick Marshall, along with his assistant and a bumpkin, accidentally gets transported back in time to a world of danger, intelligent dinosaurs and lizard people. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: The headquarters of the Kingsman organisation is destroyed by Poppy Adams, a psychotic leader of the world's largest drug cartel, the Golden Circle. Although Eggsy and Merlin survive the attack, they need help to go against the resourceful drug cartel and contact their allies in the United States. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins dons the role of a sophisticated CIA agent who tries to transform a street punk (Chris Rock) into a savvy spy after the death of his twin brother. They must together save their city from terrorists. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Fashion designer Anita (Joely Richardson) and computer game writer Roger meet, fall in love and marry along with their dalmatians Perdita and Pongo. But the proud dogs puppies are kidnapped by Anitas boss Cruella De Vil (Glenn Close), who is stealing young Dalmatians to make the fur coat she has set her heart on. Enlisting the help of the other animals, Pongo and Perdita set out to find and rescue the pups from their fearsome captors. (Film - Family)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage star in this film that centres on an influential man who leads an army of military men to attack the city of San Francisco, only to be faced by a chemical weapon expert and an ex-con who join forces to stop the destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: Thomas wakes to find himself among young boys in an enclosed setting that turns out to be the centre of a maze. With no memory of his past to guide him, Thomas and his friends plot to escape and reclaim their identities, unaware of the horrors that await them. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must save Jack Sparrow and form an alliance with the pirates around the world to fight against the East India Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: MasterChef US
programme.desc: Chef Masaharu joins the contestants as they prepare a dish featuring the Alaskan king crab. The maker of the winning dish will have the opportunity to dine in one of his restaurants. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Queen Of The South
programme.desc: Teresa has to make a choice between compromising her morals and leaving New Orleans. In the meantime, Lafayette interrogates Emilia. (TV Show - Crime)
The team responds to calls that involve a flight instructor hanging from an airplane, a bank teller who has been run over by a tractor and a man with a throat injury. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Jesus leads the group to the Kingdom to convince King Ezekiel to help them and the Hilltop against the Saviors. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp
programme.desc: With a few days left of his house arrest, Scott Lang dons the suit to help Hank and Hope 'the Wasp' Pym, who are on a risky quest to bring back Janet, Hope's mother, from the quantum realm while evading a powerful ghost-like being. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Life Of Pi
programme.desc: Celebrated director Ang Lee conjures spectacular images out of Yann Martel's bestseller of the same name and presents this story of endurance and self-discovery in which Pi (Suraj Sharma), a young man, finds himself between a rock and a hard place when he survives a disastrous shipwreck, only to discover that his life boat has another passenger, a ferocious Bengal tiger called Richard Parker. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: Goku sets out on a race against time in order to fulfil his grandfather's dying wish. He must collect a set of seven magical orbs before the vengeful King Piccolo can misuse them. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: War veteran Will Sawyer is entrusted with the task of assessing the security of a high-profile building in China. He gets framed when aides of an international terrorist hack into the security system of the building. Sawyer then struggles to prove his innocence and save his family trapped in the fire. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: When a secret agent learns of his wife's extra-marital affair, he pursues her, while at the same time he tries to pin-down terrorists in possession of nuclear missiles. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise Of The Silver Surfer
programme.desc: Comic book adventure follows Fantastic Four superheroes Reed (Ioan Gruffudd), Sue (Jessica Alba), Johnny (Chris Evans) and Ben (Michael Chiklis) as they battle the enigmatic Silver Surfer (Doug Jones), who travels the earth preparing it for total destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef US
programme.desc: The contestants are given an hour to prepare one savoury dish and one sweet dish using bread. Later, one of them must return home. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Queen Of The South
programme.desc: Upon learning that someone has been stealing from her, Teresa makes an attempt to ease tensions between her business partners. (TV Show - Crime)
Station 118 deals with calls that involve a prank gone wrong and a woman who is stuck in a bathroom window. Meanwhile, Athena and the police investigate an unusual shooting case. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Captain Marvel
programme.desc: Amidst a mission, Vers, a Kree warrior, gets separated from her team and is stranded on Earth. However, her life takes an unusual turn after she teams up with Fury, a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Land Before Time: Journey Of The Brave
programme.desc: Littlefoot, a baby dinosaur, finds out that his father is in trouble after the latter does not return home. Later, Littlefoot sets out with his friends to rescue him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: Quinn McKenna, an army sniper, along with some fugitives and a scientist, sets out to kill the Predator and save Rory, his son, who was abducted as his autism reflects advancement in human evolution. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Ajay and Dev are two small-time crooks. One day they accidentally killed a man named Mohan Tripathi. With a good and pleasant mind they find out the address of the decreased and pays a visit to his village. Only to see the young man's family eagerly waiting for his return from abroad, seeing the family's plight they decides to lie about the young man and told the family that he is alive but was delayed because of some urgent work. Days and months passed and Mohan did not showed up towards his family and both young men continues to lie to them. The question remain what will be the outcome of Ajay and Dev when the family learns that there son is no longer alive and that both are his killers? (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Tum Bin
programme.desc: Shekhar, a businessman, accidentally kills his associate Amar, and ridden with guilt, decides to watch over Amar's company and take care of his family and friends. However, he falls in love with Amar's fiancé Piya - who is to marry tycoon Abhi Gyan to save the company (Romance,Drama)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Dastak
programme.desc: Dastak is a story of a mentally unstable genius (Sharad Kapoor) and his obsession for the Miss Universe (Sushmita Sen). His unparalleled obsession makes him so possessive about her that he begins to kill people around her so that he can come close to her. Sharad Kapoor succeeds in kidnapping her and keeping her in confinement but ultimately she succeeds in getting herself free from his obsessive clutches. Mukul Dev plays the role of a police officer who tries to rescue Sushmita Sen from Sharad Kapoor. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kismat
programme.desc:
A policeman’s son begins to work with criminals. Can his life be turned around?
Ajay (Govinda) is adopted and brought up by ACP Anand (Suresh Oberoi) and his biological mother Geeta (Rakhee), though the parents believe he is actually Anand’s child. Fate intervenes when Ajay begins to work with his real father, Rajan (Kabir Bedi).

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Barsaat
programme.desc: Arav (Bobby Deol) is an ambitious young Indian whose dream is to design cars. He travels to the United States seeking greener pastures, where he meets the beautiful Anna (Bipasha Basu). Anna instantly goes head over heels for Arav, but Arav remains focused on his career. Over time, he mellows and the two fall in love. Moreover, Arav's ambitions go on the upswing as the chairman of the BMW company in the U.S. (Shakti Kapoor) gives him a job as a designer. Coincidentally, the BMW chairman happens to be Anna's grandfather, and he announces the impending nuptials of Arav and Anna.

programme.title: Daanveer
programme.desc: After the passing away of his widower and advocate dad, Vijay Srivastav takes it upon himself to raise his younger siblings, Vishal and Sudha. Years later, while Vishal is studying I.A.S., Sudha is of marriageable age, while Vijay makes a living driving an auto-rickshaw. He arranges Sudha's marriage with Anil, the only son of Ramprasad and Shanti, with a dowry of over 3 Lakh Rupees. The marriage takes place and Sudha re-locates to live with her in-laws. A few months later Vijay is informed that Sudha is expecting and brings her home. Shortly thereafter his world will be turned upside down when he finds out that Anil is getting married and had actually driven Sudha out as he suspected her of having an affair with another man. While Vijay attempts to deal with this situation, he does not know that Vishal has fallen in love with Jyoti, who is the daughter of Kalyan Singh - a man who is obsessed with avenging the death of his father at the hands of Vijay's dad, while Kalyan's son, Bheema, is all set to get married to Vijay's girlfriend, Chitra. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mumbai Meri Jaan
programme.desc: Raju comes to Mumbai in search of a job and becomes a peon for a big firm. He soon discovers that certain people are scheming to make the company go bankrupt. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Farz
programme.desc: Farz (Hindi: फ़र्ज़, translation: Duty) is a 1967 Hindi spy thriller film. Directed by Ravikant Nagaich, it has music by Laxmikant Pyarelal and lyrics by Anand Bakshi. The film stars Jeetendra and Babita along with Aruna Irani, Nagesh, Agha and David. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Insaniyat
programme.desc: A Police officer seeks the help of two gangsters to combat terrorism. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
programme.desc: Karan Khanna is an orphan and a captain in the Rajputana Armed Forces. He's madly in love with beautiful model Nisha, with whom he plans to tie the knot during his next leave. On the way to... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Pardesi Babu
programme.desc: Pardesi Babu 1998 (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Agnivarsha
programme.desc: The film is Based on an incident from the Mahabharata and also made as a play on a Girish Karnad titled Fire in the Rain. The film features Amitabh Bachchan in a cameo appearance as Lord Indra. Jackie Shroff plays the main lead in the film as Puravasu the head priest, Raveena playing the role of his unfaithful wife in love with Yavakri. Nagarjuna played Yavakri the priest's jealous rival and Prabhudeva as a demon who kills Yavakri. While Milind Soman plays the younger brother of Jackie Shroff as Aravasu, the female lead opposite Milind is played by Sonali Kulkarni. (Drama,Fantasy)

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: Ayaan lives a very wealthy lifestyle with his married brother, Karan and his wife, Anju; a younger sister, Yamini, and brother, Rahul; his mom, and grandma; and runs a garage. One day he meets with beautiful model, Ahana, and falls head over heels in love with her. She forgets her personal diary at his garage, and through this Ayaan woos, wins her heart, and both get married. Ahana soon finds out that despite of Ayaan's wealth, his family is very conservative and tradition-bound. This causes some bitterness between the newly-weds, which gets worse when she becomes pregnant and wants to abort the child. While visiting her mom on their dog's birthday, Ahana has an accident which results in a miscarriage. Ayaan blames her for losing the child, but his mother convinces him and he apologizes. Few months later, Ahana becomes pregnant again, and that's when she finds out that Ayaan had pulled wool over her eyes through her personal diary... (Romance)

programme.title: The Gentleman
programme.desc: Vijay runs a small business and is also a master thief who is wanted by the cops. But, his motive for committing theft is to build a school where students can get free education and become professionals in their field. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Zakhmi Sipahi
programme.desc: Shakti is an honest police officer out to avenge the death of his father, Gautam Gorakhnath, and the trials and obstacles he faces while he goes through corruption, love, and usual Hindi film masala. (Action)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Woh Lamhe
programme.desc: Based upon the life of actress Parveen Babi, this film describes the life of a schizophrenic actress Sana Azim, and the love of her life - Aditya Garewal. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Shiva Shakti
programme.desc: Shiva travels to the city to earn money for his sister Kusum's marriage. He meets Shakti and they become friends. When Kusum gets pregnant with Shakti's child, Shiva vows to murder him. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Run
programme.desc: This action movie is filled with romance and adventure. As Abhisek fights for his life against the forces of crime and injustice, he meets Bhoomika, who captures his heart. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Tum Bin
programme.desc: Shekhar, a businessman, accidentally kills his associate Amar, and ridden with guilt, decides to watch over Amar's company and take care of his family and friends. However, he falls in love with Amar's fiancé Piya - who is to marry tycoon Abhi Gyan to save the company (Romance,Drama)

programme.title: Kasoor
programme.desc: The film starts with the murder of Priti (Divya Dutta), wife of Shekhar (Aftab Shivdasani), a well-known journalist. Inspector Lokhande (Ashutosh Rana) investigates the case and accuses Shekhar of the murder, saying he has enough evidences to arrest him. Upon getting bail from the court, Shekhar's lawyer tells him that he will not be able to fight his case because he is a corporate lawyer. He asks him to contact Simran Bhargav (Lisa Ray), who is a criminal lawyer to fight his case. (Drama,Mystery,Thriller)

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema is told by his father, Dinu, that generations of their family have always been slaves to the wealthy Thakurs. When Bheema does not heed this, and not only befriends Sonam, Thakur Daulat Singh's daughter, but also has a physical altercation with Raja Bahadur, Thakur's son, he is publicly whipped. Shortly thereafter his dad passes away after being bitten by a snake. Daulat finds out that Sonam likes Bheema and has her moved to London, and ensures that she forgets him. Subsequently, on her return as an adult she returns home and is told that Bheema is serving 3 years in prison for killing a male named Shamsher Singh. Nevertheless, she renews her friendship with him but will soon find him on the run from the Police - this time for killing a union leader named Kumar. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: Ayaan lives a very wealthy lifestyle with his married brother, Karan and his wife, Anju; a younger sister, Yamini, and brother, Rahul; his mom, and grandma; and runs a garage. One day he meets with beautiful model, Ahana, and falls head over heels in love with her. She forgets her personal diary at his garage, and through this Ayaan woos, wins her heart, and both get married. Ahana soon finds out that despite of Ayaan's wealth, his family is very conservative and tradition-bound. This causes some bitterness between the newly-weds, which gets worse when she becomes pregnant and wants to abort the child. While visiting her mom on their dog's birthday, Ahana has an accident which results in a miscarriage. Ayaan blames her for losing the child, but his mother convinces him and he apologizes. Few months later, Ahana becomes pregnant again, and that's when she finds out that Ayaan had pulled wool over her eyes through her personal diary... (Romance)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan and Sharad Kapoor are the leaders of the two rival gangs. Aishwarya Rai is Shah Rukh Khan's twin sister. Shah Rukh is in love with Priya Gill. Chandrachur Singh is Sharad Kapoor's younger brother who studies in a catering college in Bombay. He comes to Goa to visit his brother and plans to go back and start a restaurant there. He sees Aishwarya and falls in love with her. Chandrachur gives up the idea of going back to Bombay and opens a bakery in Goa. When Shah Rukh comes to know about the romance between Aishwarya and Chandrachur, the fight between the gang turns more violent. How the conflict is resolved is the rest of the story. Written by gavin@sunny_deol2009@yahoo.com (Action,Drama,Musical,Romance)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Bombay Police are baffled when several bar girls and prostitutes are found brutally murdered by a scalpel.

programme.title: Billoo Badshah
programme.desc: Billoo, an orphan sacrifices for the family who helped him when he was alone. Later on, he faces humiliation and homelessness.

programme.title: Jai Santoshi Maa
programme.desc: Mahima lives a middle-class lifestyle with her parents, Pooja and music teacher,Gautam. She is in love with a young man, Anuraag, whose foster father, Pratap, is very friendly with Gautam. Both Gautam and Pratap arrange to get the youngsters married, however, when they arrive at Pratap's house, they are met with open hostility by Pratap's wife, Shanti, her sons, Sukhpal, Shripal, and their respective wives Shobha and Suman, and do not approve of her as she did not bring in any dowry. Nevertheless, Mahima, a devotee of Devi Maa Santoshi, decides to win them over with her love and hard work. Then Anuraag is accused of stealing one Lakh rupees from the family's electronic showroom, he vehemently denies this, and even offers to leave for Bombay, earn the money and then return. (Drama,Family)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Pardesi Babu
programme.desc: Pardesi Babu 1998 (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Ajay and Dev are two small-time crooks. One day they accidentally killed a man named Mohan Tripathi. With a good and pleasant mind they find out the address of the decreased and pays a visit to his village. Only to see the young man's family eagerly waiting for his return from abroad, seeing the family's plight they decides to lie about the young man and told the family that he is alive but was delayed because of some urgent work. Days and months passed and Mohan did not showed up towards his family and both young men continues to lie to them. The question remain what will be the outcome of Ajay and Dev when the family learns that there son is no longer alive and that both are his killers? (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that Editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he come across evidence that would expose some very influential people. (Crime,Romance)

programme.title: 16 December
programme.desc: White collar crimes that drain the nation of precious foreign exchange is connected to the funding of international terrorism. The much-told Hollywood theme is retold in the Indian context with much needed technical wizadry. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Ram Balram
programme.desc: Ram and Balram are 2 young boys who live with their loving parents. Their scheming uncle, Jagatpal, however kills the boy's father and mother. Jagatpal lies to the boys that their parents have been killed in an accident and promises to raise them himself. He enrolls the younger brother Balram, in school and eventually sends him off to join the police force. The older becomes a mechanic. Jagatpal has a tight hold on the boys, even when Ram is an adult, he still gives all his wages to his uncle and is only allowed to keep a few rupees for pocket money. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Basha: The Boss
programme.desc: At a construction site, a huge cache of weapons is discovered. Investigative Officers Balram and Varma use various tactics to nab the culprit. Will they succeed in their mission? (Action)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Masters
programme.desc: Milan Paul and Sreeramakrishnan are best friends who have been together since college. The intensity of their friendship has not faded though the carefree days of college have long past gone. Now Sree is an ASP (Assistant Superintendent of Police) of Kottayam and Milan is a renowned reporter in the same city. Though in different fields both are in highly responsible jobs. In effect, both of them use their friendship to fulfill their respective social responsibilities. (Crime,Thriller)

programme.title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
programme.desc: Roopa lives a wealthy lifestyle with her husband, Prakash Chandra, who works for her dad, Manoharlal Verma, and a daughter named Sharda alias Pinky. Roopa and Prakash do not get along and Roopa suspects that Prakash is having an affair. Her suspicious nature gets a boost when a woman named Sharda Dayal Sharma moves into a house next door. Roopa starts vile rumors about Sharda having an affair with Prakash. (Drama,Family)

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Tilak
programme.desc: A girl turns into a dacoit after her family is killed by rivals. She has a change of heart and gives up her weapons, assumes an alias and falls in love with an inspector. But her past soon catches up. (Action)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Duniya Meri Muthi Mein
programme.desc: Don Bosco, a young man, is studying to be a priest at a seminary. But when he learns that the Pathaam Kalam gang is responsible for his father's murder, he leaves everything to get his revenge. (Action)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Dil Ki Baazi
programme.desc: An unemployed youth faces challenges after he secures employment. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz
programme.desc: Wealthy Lata I. Prasad refuses to obey her widower father's instructions to get married to equally wealthy Rajan, the second son of Sikanker Lal Thakkar, her dad's business partner. She runs away from home, and shortly thereafter her father locates her living with a truck-driver, Vishwa Pratap, and his pretty sister, Lakshmi. She refuses to return home, and insists on marrying Vishwa. She will soon regret her decision when she finds out that Vishwa has been arrested for killing a male named Billa, and may either spend his life behind bars or be hanged. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Kaliya No. 1
programme.desc: A tough police officer goes out of his way to bring down the underworld dons and is even ready to murder them in planned encounters to rid the society of evil.

programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Velaiyilla Pattathari
programme.desc: Raghuvaran, who is unemployed for years, gets his dream job but a powerful rival is keen to put him down. Can he take on his adversary? (Action,Romance,Comedy)

programme.title: Shoorveer
programme.desc: A fashion editor who hates horses decides to pursue horse racing to impress the girl (Rakul Preet Singh) of his dreams. (Romance,Action)

programme.title: OMG! Oh My God
programme.desc: Adapted from a Gujarati play by Bhavesh Mandalia, writer Umesh Shukla has adapted the drama to the big screen quite skillfully. Paresh Rawal’s character Kanjilal gets some of the best dialogues and thespian does full justice to them. Kanjilal’s arguments and counter-questions are very well thought out. The take on the God-men is very interesting. The best part was the parallel drawn to the Mahabharata towards the end, with Krishna (Akshay) re-playing his role as the legendary charioteer-advisor for a warrior (Arjun then, Kanji now). (Comedy,Drama,Fantasy)

programme.title: Home Delivery: Aapko... Ghar Tak
programme.desc: Sunny Malhotra (Vivek Oberoi) is a 28 year old writer who has carved a name for himself as a popular agony uncle, named Gyan Guru, writing for the Times of Hindustan. Sunny also managed to bag a prestigious screenplay writing project for the most happening film director, Karan Johar. A bit of a cynic, he believes he is a self-made man and that whatever he has achieved in life is due to his own hard work and nobody else's. His cynicism is extended to his views about marriage to his fiancé Jenny (Ayesha Takia) and to the festival of Diwali too. Just as Sunny is cynical about life, Michael Burnett (Boman Irani) is optimistic about it. 51 year old Michael is a simple minded man, almost childlike and has recently landed job as a pizza delivery boy at Mummy's Pizza. Michael has sort of an inclination to lose every job he has ever had in 2 days flat. This time, however, he vows to keep this one no matter what. On the eve of Diwali, Sunny has loads of stuff to do and very little time to do it. He has to meet his screenplay deadline, he has to get rid of Pandey (Saurabh Shukla) his irritatingly intrusive next door neighbor and he's got to avoid his editor's telephone calls who is livid that he's bunking work. But more importantly he needs to get Jenny out of the way because he has a date with Maya (Mahima Chaudhary), a South Indian superstar who he has been in love with since as long as he can remember. In this confusion, Sunny forgets that there is no food in his bachelor pad and orders a pizza that Michael is given the task of delivering. And what Michael delivers to Sunny is so much more than just a pizza. Sunny is home delivered life's simple lessons right to his doorstep. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town. Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken. When Charlie revives him, she quickly learns this is no ordinary yellow VW bug. (Action,Adventure,Science Fiction)

programme.title: Pad Man
programme.desc: Concerned about his wife Gayatri's menstrual hygiene, Lakshmikant Chauhan urges her to ditch the cloth and opt for sanitary napkins. Gayatri is reluctant to go for disposable pads as they are expensive. Lakshmi obsessing over a 'ladies problem' makes her cringe but he insists on bringing upon a change by addressing the taboo topic. Subjected to hostility for ruffling the religious and age-old beliefs of people around, can the man brave the resistance and get his point across? (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: When siblings Judy and Peter discover an enchanted board game that opens the door to a magical world, they unwittingly invite Alan -- an adult who's been trapped inside the game for 26 years -- into their living room. Alan's only hope for freedom is to finish the game, which proves risky as all three find themselves running from giant rhinoceroses, evil monkeys and other terrifying creatures. (Adventure,Fantasy,Family)

programme.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
programme.desc: A musical romantic movie exploring the journey that ensues when the blue blooded boy Inder, "Who wanted to love no one" crosses paths with Saru, "Whom no one wanted to love". All their lives they were waiting to meet, but they just didn't know it . A musical tale of love , longing and loss. Sanam Teri Kasam - A Love story sealed with a Curse. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Heyy Babyy
programme.desc: Three handsome Sydney bachelors Aroush,Tanmay and Al – are having the time of their lives in Sydney. They flirt around, and have numerous conquests to their credit. They suddenly find their dating and mating rituals destroyed when a dimpled little roommate lands up on their doorstep. When it comes to babies, they’re total zeroes and this bundle of joy is anything but joyous. (Drama,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Dhamaal is about four friends; Boman Contractor (Aashish Chaudhary), who lives a wealthy lifestyle with his eccentric dad, Nari (Asrani); dim-witted Manav (Jaaved Jaffrey), his elder brother Adi (Arshad Warsi); and Roy (Ritesh Deshmukh). All four are afflicted by the get-rich-quick virus. Their fortunes take a turn after they accidentally bump into an underworld don Bose (Prem Chopra) whilst he is about to die, who tells them about a hidden treasure in St. Sebastian Garden, Goa including ₹10crores. The group race towards Goa in Nari's stolen car, little knowing that their plans will soon be foiled, albeit hilariously, by Police Inspector Kabir Nayak (Sanjay Dutt), who wants the money at any cost. (Comedy)

programme.title: Kismet Love Paisa Dilli
programme.desc: Set in Delhi, Kismet Love Paisa Dilli is a one night madcap story of Tharki Lucky and his Gazab Totta, Lovina. Lucky is a college going middle class Delhi boy and Lovina is the girl next door, who miss their last metro back home and a series of on the edge moments occur through the night where Lokesh and Lovina run across Delhi on this roller coaster of a ride. From cold streets to glitzy farmhouse parties, from crazy cops to all.. to gradually fall in love (Adventure,Comedy,Crime)

programme.title: Khatarnak Khiladi
programme.desc: A man returns to his country in order to reform the violent family of his girlfriend, but he actually seems to be having a strange connection and a rather dark past which one could hardly expect. (Family,Action)

programme.title: Nigahen: Nagina Part II
programme.desc: At the age of 7, Anand is caught by Tantrik Goraknath and is subsequently transformed into a snake by this sage. He is held captive in a box until 15 years has passed and Goraknath wants to obtain a priceless gemstone from wealthy Neelam, who's the only person that knows its location. And to carry out his task he decides to send Anand as a snake in the form of a human to Neelam, which Anand does, but both is attracted to each other, gets married and is settled down in Neelam's mansion. This gemstone is protected by two black snakes, whose magical powers has empowered Neelam's body, so that when Goraknath tries to harm Anand all his powers and mediations to Bhairavnath will all be in vain and for Neelam to project herself as the only snake god in the universe that has magical powers. (Drama,Family)

programme.title: Khatarnak Khiladi 3
programme.desc: Jaggu Dada's grandfather and father are underworld dons. The wish of his mother is to see him become a big villain. So, he goes to Mumbai to keep the promise made to his grandfather and also finds the girl of his dreams. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Bol
programme.desc: Bol is a roller coaster of emotions, yet carries subtleties that make your heartbeat stop. Based in the heart of Lahore, the story takes place in a house full of daughters, with vibrancy of life, yet restrictions on blooming. It questions the worth of a human being, may it be a woman or a person born with a birth defect. It questions the authority of reproducing human beings into this world without taking responsibility of acknowledging their worth. Bol takes you through a journey into the life of this family experiencing their troubles, sufferings, resolves and high points. As family members take decision to solve their problems they step into deeper troubles. The complexity of their circumstances becomes a struggle of life and death. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Baazaar
programme.desc: After moving to Mumbai, an ambitious young man becomes the stock trader for a notorious businessman. (Crime,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Bhagmati
programme.desc: Raghava, a cricket-lover, suffers from an irrational fear of ghosts. When he and his friends accidentally select a haunted cricket ground to play, Raghava gets possessed by three ghosts. (Horror)

programme.title: Love Aaj Kal
programme.desc: Is love today different from what it was in the past when lovers like Laila-Majnu or Romeo-Juliet perished in each other’s arms? Today, in the age of online romance and one-night stands, many would say love is just a whirlwind. But no! ‘Love Aaj Kal’ will have you believe that certain things don’t change with the passage of time. (Comedy,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Don No. 1
programme.desc: Surya lives a middle-classed lifestyle along with his honest father who is a Police Inspector. When his father arrests a gangster, he is killed, leaving Surya alone to fend for himself. He overcomes many problems, comes to the rescue of a young boy, Jadhav, and together they assist other oppressed youth, who subsequently make Surya their leader. Years later Surya is a much respected and equally feared Don, and lives a wealthy lifestyle along with Jadhav, Bannerjee, and Mathur as his trusted assistants. He dispenses justice quickly and comes to the assistance of the poor and needy. He meets with Mathur's daughter, Priya, and both fall in love with each other. Jadhav, meets with Nandini, and wants to get married to her. Then complications shatter their lives when Pakistani gangster, Feroz, starts taking an interest in India and wants Surya to join forces with him. When Surya refuses, Feroz lets lose a reign of terror that will devastate and change Surya's life forever. (Drama,Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Boss
programme.desc: A young man disowned by his family is aided by a big business owner. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Main Hoon Surya Singham 2
programme.desc: Picking up the storyline from where Singam ended, Duraisingam (Suriya) has gone undercover after meeting the Home Minister and is working as an NCC officer in a school in Thoothukudi. The only people who know about this operation are the Chief Minister and Home Minister apart from himself. (Comedy,Action,Thriller,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Dangerous Khiladi 3
programme.desc: Police-Ravi is a student aspiring to become a police officer,becomes hunted when he helps his friend out of trouble.The hunted becomes the Hunter to secure his future. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Size Zero
programme.desc: A plus-sized woman battles the owner of a slimming centre. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Talaash The Hunt Begins
programme.desc: -The Hunt Begins- For them it was revenge. For him it was a challenge. A timeless ride on a ferocious mission. (Action,Musical,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Ratham
programme.desc: Dev, a youngster, always seeks misadventures. A series of problems arise when his friend jokingly sets him up with a businesswoman, who has not time for nonsense. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Bunglow No 17
programme.desc: Gautham and Deeksha, along with their daughter, move into an isolated bungalow gifted to them by Gautham's father. Soon, they start experiencing paranormal activities around the house. (Horror)
